name: commitjob-backend-monorepo
description: CommitJob Backend - 졸업작품 맞춤형 채용 플랫폼

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:catch" "npm run start:mcp" "npm run start:backend" --names "🐍CATCH,🤖MCP,🌐BACKEND" --prefix-colors "green,blue,yellow"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../mcp-recs-service && npm install && cd ../catch-scraper-service && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.health: curl http://localhost:4001/health && curl http://localhost:4002/health && curl http://localhost:3000/health
